第二十四航空戦隊 | image = | caption = | dates =1940-1944 | country =[[Japan]] | allegiance = | branch =[[Aviation]] | type = | role = | size = | command_structure =[[4th Fleet (Imperial Japanese Navy)|4th Fleet]] | garrison = | garrison_label = | nickname = | patron = | motto = | colors = | march = | mascot = | equipment = | battles = | anniversaries = | decorations = | battle_honours = }} The '''24th Air Flotilla''' (第二十四航空戦隊, Dai-Nijūyon Kōkū-Sentai) was a combat aviation unit of the [[Imperial Japanese Navy]] (IJN) during the [[Pacific War|Pacific Campaign]] of [[World War II]]. The flotilla, mainly consisting of land-based bombers, fighters, and flying boats, reported to the IJN's [[4th Fleet (Imperial Japanese Navy)|4th Fleet]]. As originally organized, the flotilla's core units were the 4th Air Corps, Yokohama Air Corps, and 1st Air Corps.Bullard, pp.32-33. ==Organization== *The ''4th Combined Air Group'' (第4連合航空隊, Dai-yon Rengō Kōkutai) was original unit of the ''24th Air Flotilla'', therefore, describe this section from the ''4th Combined Air Group''. {| class="wikitable" !
